title: GE2025: Ong Ye Kung introduces 2 SME bosses as new faces in Sembawang GRC
summary: Health Minister Ong Ye Kung introduces two new potential PAP candidates, Ng Shi Xuan and Gabriel Lam, both SME business leaders, for Sembawang GRC in the upcoming election.

title: GE2025: 'Always a challenge' to win back a GRC, says PAP Sengkang team's Lam Pin Min
summary: PAP Sengkang team led by Lam Pin Min with new faces Elmie Nekmat, Theodora Lai Xi Yi and Bernadette Giam conduct walkabout as they hope to win back the GRC from WP.

title: GE2025: PSP's Hazel Poa open to contesting single-seat ward to 'walk my talk'
summary: PSP's Hazel Poa says she's willing to contest in an SMC rather than staying in West Coast-Jurong West GRC, to prove she doesn't need to ride on others' coattails.

title: RDU Facebook Announcement
summary: RDU announces plans to contest in Jurong East, Tampines, Radin Mas, Jurong-Kranji, Jurong, and Nee Soon constituencies

title: PAR Facebook Announcement
summary: PAR announces plans to contest in Kebun Baru, Yio Chu Kang, Queenstown, Pasir Ris, Jurong-Kranji, Jurong Barat, Marine Parade, Bukit Sembawang, and MacPherson-Braddell constituencies

title: SPP Facebook Announcement
summary: SPP announces plans to contest in Pasir Ris and Bukit Sembawang constituencies

title: PPP Facebook Announcement
summary: PPP announces plans to contest in Jurong-Kranji, Ang Mo Kio, Nee Soon, Toa Payoh-Choa Chu Kang, and Tampines constituencies

title: NSP Facebook Announcement
summary: NSP announces plans to contest in Jurong Barat, Marine Yishun, Sengkang, Toa Payoh-Choa Chu Kang, Sembawang, Mountbatten-Hougang, and Tampines constituencies

title: PAP New Faces Redeployment
summary: Three PAP new faces - Chua Wei Shan, Valerie Lee, and David Hoe - redeployed as part of cabinet reshuffle and preparations for GE2025

title: Potential NSP Candidates for Tampines Spotted
summary: Five potential NSP candidates - Reno Fong, Mohamad Ridzwan, Lim Rui Xian, Nur Farahiyah Mahfoot, and Thamilselvan Karuppaya - spotted during walkabout in Tampines

title: PPP withdraws from Nee Soon GRC
summary: PPP withdraws from Nee Soon GRC to allow RDU to contest the constituency

title: SDP announces candidates for Sembawang West SMC and Bukit Panjang SMC
summary: SDP announces Chee Soon Juan to contest Sembawang West SMC and Paul Tambyah to run in Bukit Panjang SMC; party also plans to field a team in Sembawang GRC

title: PSP re-elects Leong Mun Wai as party chief
summary: Leong Mun Wai has been re-elected as PSP secretary-general, taking over from Hazel Poa who becomes vice-chair. A'bas Bin Kasmani appointed as second vice-chairman and S. Nallakaruppan as treasurer.

title: GE2025: Singapore Democratic Party to contest in Marsiling-Yew Tee GRC
summary: SDP confirms it will contest in Marsiling-Yew Tee GRC where PM Lawrence Wong is the anchor MP.

title: GE2025: WP's likely replacement for Raeesah Khan outlines plans for improvements in Sengkang
summary: Abdul Muhaimin Abdul Malik, likely to replace Raeesah Khan in WP's Sengkang team, outlines plans to address lift issues in Compassvale using his experience as a senior property manager at AHTC.

title: Ex-IMH director, Harvard graduate look set to be part of WP's slate in GE2025
summary: Workers' Party prepares to field its largest pool of first-time candidates with at least 17 new faces, including former IMH director Dr Ong Lue Ping and Harvard graduate Michael Thng.

title: GE2025: Singapore United Party to make election debut at upcoming contest in Ang Mo Kio
summary: SUP announces its debut contest in Ang Mo Kio GRC for GE2025, potentially facing PAP and PPP.

title: GE2025: PSP to contest West Coast-Jurong West and Chua Chu Kang, says it will field fewer candidates
summary: PSP launches its manifesto focusing on cost of living and jobs, confirms contest in West Coast-Jurong West and Chua Chu Kang GRCs, and announces plan to field fewer candidates.

title: Trade unionist Natasha Choy joins Desmond Lee’s team in West Coast
summary: PAP newcomer Natasha Choy has joined National Development Minister Desmond Lee's team in West Coast GRC.

title: GE2025: Singapore Democratic Party unveils 5-member slate for Sembawang GRC
summary: Singapore Democratic Party (SDP) has introduced its slate for the five-member Sembawang GRC

title: GE2025: Why this 32-year-old is setting up a political party to contest East Coast GRC
summary: Restaurant owner Chia Yun Kai said that he decided to set up Most Valuable Party (MVP) to context in East Coast GRC

title: Red Dot United to contest Holland-Bukit Timah GRC, introduces three potential candidates
summary: Red Dot United (RDU) introduces Fazli Talip, Sharad Kumar, and Patrick Tan as potential candidates for Holland-Bukit Timah GRC.

title: Faishal Ibrahim to move from Nee Soon to Marine Parade-Braddell Heights GRC for GE2025
summary: Minister of State for Home Affairs and National Development Muhammad Faishal Ibrahim will join the PAP team in Marine Parade-Braddell Heights GRC to contest the upcoming general election.

title: GE2025: Maliki Osman set to be replaced by new face Hazlina Abdul Halim in East Coast GRC
summary: Second Minister for Education and Foreign Affairs Maliki Osman will not be part of the PAP slate for East Coast GRC
